ValidationRule.description: Lost Date and Reason only when the stage set to lost
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Closed Lost")) ||(ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Terminal Returned")), OR( NOT( ISBLANK( Lost_Date__c ) ), NOT (ISBLANK (TEXT (Lost_Reason__c ))) ), ($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: These two fields can be filled up only when the stage is Closed Lost or Terminal Returned
